Checker documentation
==========================

This is a cross-platform, pluggable tool for comparing the
configuration of a machine with a known configuration stored in text
files in a source control system. 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   installation.txt
   use.txt
   checkers.txt
   development.txt
   changes.txt
   license.txt

==================
